name: myMessage
shortDescription: Decentralized social media & data storage protocol with user incentivizing
description: myMessage is the world's first-ever light-grade decentralized reddit-like social media & data storage platform built on a multi-chain structure, supporting evolving applications including a decentralized Thread-reply bulletin board, messaging dApp, developer tools & SDKs and Data Portal to provide encrypted data feedings to Web3 applications with Quantum-resistant level of security.
